description: AppV_Manage is the tool of choice for people packaging in App-V 5 for performing the initial tests on recently sequenced packages.  It is used on an App-V client test machine, and requires no back-end servers (although a file share where the packages are stored is typically used). You sequence, copy the package up to the share, and bounce over to the client to test.
summary: AppV_Manage is the tool of choice for people packaging in App-V 5.
author: TMurgent Technologies
